wikipedia_page.main: Sophie Howard (born 24 February 1983) is a former glamour model from Southport, England. She appeared regularly on Page 3 and in men's magazines such as  Maxim, Nuts and Loaded. In August 2005, Howard was voted 73rd in the FHM UK "100 Sexiest Women" poll. In the 2006 poll, she rose to 68th place.

response: * Sophie Howard, British glamour modelAngie Davidson interviews top glamour model Sophie Howard, Lupus.org.uk, accessed 21 November 2008
